how it works

step1

Bootstrap straight from your web app

Copy and paste your web app url into ToDesktop. Customise your app design, app icon and window frame UI with no code.

  • multiple windows
  • Offline support
  • Launch on start up
  • Menubar/tray menu
  • Customisable menus
  • Tabs(windows only)
step2

Bootstrap straight from your web app

Copy and paste your web app url into ToDesktop. Customise your app design, app icon and window frame UI with no code.

  • multiple windows
  • Offline support
  • Launch on start up
  • Menubar/tray menu
  • Customisable menus
  • Tabs(windows only)
